document_data.caption: A map of the Cities of the Pantheon showing Al-Musammas River in the southeast.
document_data.name: Al-Musammas River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Musammas River''' was found in the far southeast corner of the [[Cities of the Pantheon]] in [[interior Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Geography: Al-Musammas River originated in the center of the southern fork of [[Al-Sayaj Mountains]]. The river flowed south and emptied into the [[Crowded Sea]]. The great city of [[Mahabba]] was found along its western bank.
